did.abstract: Letters to and from William Dehon, an Episcopal clergyman of Pineville, S.C., and his family and friends. Topics mentioned in letters from family members in Charleston, S.C. include vaccination for smallpox and vericella; and the religious life and instruction of slaves. Letters from family members provide accounts of travels in France, England, Ireland, and New York. A few letters contain information regarding women's fashions and hairstyles.
